FAQ / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Scavenge the Battlefield

  1. Cog is equipped to a bot which dies while Scavenge the Battlefield is in effect. Will Cog transfer to another bot or will he leave the Battlefield first and end up in KO area? [Source: WotC]
    Yes, Scavenge the Battlefield allows you to move Cog in his Weapon mode to another character on the Battlefield.
  2. I need a rule clarification about the interaction between Erratic Energy Grenade and Scavenge the Battlefield. I'm assuming that when the character with the grenade is KO'd, and I use Scavenge the Battlefield, I deal 2 damage to each enemy AND I put the grenade onto another character. Am I correct? I'm trying to convert my Constructicons into a football team. [Source: WotC]
    Touchdown!
